mapper.sql: seqno, zipname, filename, sfid, ertn, fcer, erlc,errs,rctn,fcrc,ocnm,otdt,otcd,otic,rclc,rcsg,create_date
mapper.select: select a.filename,a.sfid,a.erlc,b.chn,a.errs,a.otic,a.ocnm,a.otdt,a.otcd from t_receipt_manage a, t_mark_chn b where a.mark=b.mark and a.filename=( select filename from t_receipt_manage t where t.seqno=${value} )
select filename from t_receipt_manage t where t.seqno=${value}
select a.seqno,a.filename,a.sfid,a.otic,a.ocnm,a.otdt,a.otcd from t_receipt_manage a where a.filename='${value}'
select distinct a.otic,a.ocnm,a.otdt,a.otcd ,a.mark,a.text from t_receipt_manage a where a.otic='${value}'
select distinct a.otic,a.ocnm,a.otdt,a.otcd from t_receipt_manage a where a.filename='${value}'
mapper.update: update t_receipt_manage set text=#{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where otic=#{otic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and erlc=#{erlc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select distinct a.otic from t_receipt_manage a where a.otic is not null and a.filename='${value}'
mapper.update: update t_receipt_manage set ocnm=#{ocnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, otic=#{otic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, otdt=#{otdt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, otcd=#{otcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where seqno=#{seqno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_receipt_manage (seqno, zipname, filename, sfid, ertn, fcer, erlc, errs, rctn, fcrc, ocnm, otdt, otcd, otic, rclc, rcsg, create_date,mark) values (#{seqno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ertn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{erlc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rctn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ocnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otdt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rclc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rcsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select chn from t_mark_chn t where t.mark='${value}'
mapper.update: UPDATE t_receipt_manage SET path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE filename = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select path from t_receipt_manage t where t.seqno=${value}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_receipt_manage
seqno,
zipname,
filename,
sfid,
ertn,
fcer,
erlc,
errs,
rctn,
fcrc,
ocnm,
otdt,
otcd,
otic,
rclc,
rcsg,
create_date,
